misson: I am currently hunting for a cloud/server/administration type role that utilizes my skills in various programming languages, automation, cloud infrastructure knowledge, customer service skills and troubleshooting accumen.

highlights: I served as the primary point of contact for a company with over 34,000 employees, handling and routing thousands of cases through SNOW and ServiceNow. I developed solutions for difficult issues and fostered effective communication across job titles. I also cross-trained in various forms of support, including chat, meetings, calls, and email correspondence.

I provided consulting services for Apple brand desktop, handheld, and mobile devices. I examined and documented support tickets related to user use, repair, and service plans. I troubleshooted and provided hands-on or remote support, and communicated with clients and coworkers about technical and account issues. I developed strong customer relation skills and earned the opportunity to be trained in various areas of business.
